import "../../style/pages/user.css" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import { useStore } from "react-redux" import NameEditor from "../../component/NameEditor" import useToken from "../../utils/useToken" function User () { const store = useStore() const token = store.getState().token const data = useToken(token) const [user,setUser] = useState({"firstName":"","lastName":""}) useEffect (() => { const fetchData = async() => { const userData = await data.body setUser({"firstName": userData.firstName,"lastName":userData.lastName}) } fetchData() },[]) return (

) } export default User
